文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_037_chunk1
证据片段: The longterm out-of-reactor (autoclave) Zircaloy-2 corrosion data of Kass [7] were employed to derive an empirical relationship equating the post-transition (linear) corrosion rate constant with an exponential function of the reciprocal of the absolute temperature of the corroding surface.

证据片段: the accelerated corrosion performance of Zircaloy in a neutron irradiation environment has been reported by many investigators

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_037_chunk1
证据片段: Capillary condensation measurements of the pore size distribution, transmission electron microscopy using ion micromilling to thin the oxide, and a-c impedance measurements in aqueous electrolytes have been used to obtain information on the porosity and grain structure of post-transition oxide films grown in oxygen at $6 0 0 ^ { \circ } \mathbf { C }$ on Zircaloy-2.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_037_chunk1
证据片段: The results indicate that the films contain important amounts of very fine porosity which is interconnected to the exterior surface.

证据片段: Many studies have shown that the Zircaloys in most oxidation media initially corrode at a relatively low and steadily decreasing rate.
